name: Eat, Sleep, Bet, Repeat
description: You are unemployed and living on benefits in a filthy town centre bedsit circa late 1980's Britain. There are no jobs and there is no future but you don't care because there is a betting shop, kebab house and pub right outside your front door and today is the day your benefits cheque arrives!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core Duo @ 2.4GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel integrated HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel i3, i5 or i7 or equivalent. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce series 6 or later DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
